title: Queen Rania of Jordan  |  Archives of Women's Political Communication

quotes: Queen Rania was born August 31, 1970, in Kuwait to Palestinian parents.
She obtained a bachelor's degree in business administration from the American University of Cairo in 1991,
On June 10, 1991, she married Prince Abdullah bin Al Hussein of Jordan,
who assumed power as king on February 7, 1999.
Queen of Jordan, 1999-present
Interview with CNN's Christiane Amanpour - Sep. 22, 2016
Remarks at the Global Women's Forum - Feb. 23, 2016
Sapienza University of Rome Commencement Address - Dec. 10, 2015
Abu Dhabi Media Summit Opening Statement - Nov. 18, 2014
A Tale of Twenty-Two Cities - Nov. 7, 2013
Remarks at Yale University - Sept. 22, 2009
